dn3:1.11.1: āgaccheyyātha → āgaccheyyātho (bj, pts1ed) | manasi kareyyātha → manasi kareyyātho (bj, pts1ed)
dn3:1.12.7: garuṁ karonti → garukaronti (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
dn3:1.15.9: karakaṇḍaṁ → karakaṇḍuṁ (sya-all); karaṇḍuṁ (pts1ed) | sinisūraṁ → nipuraṁ (bj); sinipuraṁ (sya-all); sīnipuraṁ (pts1ed) | okkāmukhaṁ → ukkāmukhaṁ (bj, sya-all)
dn3:1.28.1: Brahmunā pesā, ambaṭṭha → brahmunāpi ambaṭṭha (bj, mr); brahmunā cesā ambaṭṭha (sya-all); brahmunāpi esā ambaṭṭha (pts1ed)
dn3:2.2.7.2.1: sīlasampanno, indriyesu guttadvāro → bhojane mattaññū (bj, mr)
dn3:2.2.7.4.3: Pisuṇaṁ vācaṁ → pisuṇāvācaṁ (pts1ed) | samaggarato → samaggarāmo (bj) | anuppadātā → anuppādātā (pts1ed)
dn3:2.2.7.11.2: nāḷikaṁ asiṁ → khaggaṁ (bj, pts1ed); asiṁ khaggaṁ (sya-all, km); khaggaṁ asiṁ (mr)
dn3:2.2.7.12.2: janapadakathaṁ itthikathaṁ → itthikathaṁ purisakathaṁ (bj, cck, sya1ed, pts1ed); itthīkathaṁ purisakathaṁ (sya2ed); itthikathaṁ purisakathaṁ kumārakathaṁ kumārikathaṁ (mr)
dn3:2.2.7.29.3: byantiṁ kareyya → byantīkareyya (bj, sya-all, km); vyantikareyya (pts1ed)
dn3:2.2.7.30.5: na ca me → nacassa me (bj, mr)
dn3:2.2.12.2.1: paripphuṭāni → paripphaṭāni (sya-all); paripphuṭṭhāni (pts1ed) | nāssa → nassā (bj) | parisannāni → abhisannāni (sya1ed, sya2ed); abhisandāni parisandāni (mr)
dn3:2.2.17.2.2: pītaṁ vā lohitaṁ vā → pītakaṁ vā lohitakaṁ vā (mr)
dn3:2.2.18.2.1: īsikaṁ → isikaṁ (bj, sya-all); isīkaṁ (pts1ed) | Seyyathā → seyyathāpi (bj, pts1ed) | pavāheyya → pabbāheyya (sya-all, mr)
dn3:2.2.18.2.3: pavāḷhā’ti → pavālhāti (bj); pabbāḷhāti (cck, sya1ed, mr); pabāḷhāti (sya2ed)
dn3:2.2.18.12.1: rathikāyapi vīthiṁ sañcarante → rathiyā vītisañcarantenapi (bj); rathiyāya vithiṁ sañcarantepi (sya-all); rathiyā vīthi sañcarantepi (pts1ed)
